results.title: Lovastatin and simvastatin prevention studies.
results.text_hl: A Scandinavian study of 4,000 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ will determine if @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ will improve total survival and reduce fatal or nonfatal @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Death_Sudden</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003645 @@@sudden death@@@ for at least 3 years.

citations.NLM: Jones PH. Lovastatin and simvastatin prevention studies. Am J Cardiol. 1990 Sep 18;66(8):39B-43B. PMID: 2206035
citations.BibTeX: @article{2206035, title={Lovastatin and simvastatin prevention studies.}, author={Jones PH}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={66}, number={8}, pages={39B-43B}}

results.title: Design and baseline results of the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study of patients with stable angina and/or previous myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: The secondary objective is to investigate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment reduces the incidence of major @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@ events (fatal and nonfatal @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Death_Sudden</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003645 @@@sudden death@@@).

citations.NLM: Design and baseline results of the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study of patients with stable angina and/or previous myocardial infarction. Am J Cardiol. 1993 Feb 15;71(5):393-400. PMID: 8430625
citations.BibTeX: @article{8430625, title={Design and baseline results of the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study of patients with stable angina and/or previous myocardial infarction.}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={71}, number={5}, pages={393-400}}
